KVB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 09 Relationship Manager Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 22, 2025, 15:09 IST
 Karur Vysya Bank Limited
 9 Jobs |  Posted On : 22-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 50,000 to 60,000




FOLLOW

The Karur Vysya Bank (KVB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 09 Relationship Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree or MBA can apply for the KVB Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Tamil Nadu.

KVB Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies 	Education
Relationship Manager	09	Any Degree, MBA

KVB Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

KVB Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written Test.
Interview.

KVB Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

KVB Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 50,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 60,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the KVB Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the KVB Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	21-08-2025
Closing date	31-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
